CHAT.comment: Two of the target child's brothers were participating during this particular episode. The BRO speaker ID is used to indicate utterances spoken by one of the brothers whose identity is unknown

u.a: looks at picture then closes books
picks Dougall up and puts down
picks comb up and gives to Nicola
puts pen down and picks it up
<bef> picks pen up and waves it
picks triangle up and fails to put in
tries to pull pieces and put them in box
